name: hdfs
description: Hadoop Distributed File System (HDFS), Highly Available
postInstallNotes:
HDFS DCOS Service has been successfully installed!
Note that the service is alpha and there may be bugs, incomplete features, incorrect documentation or other discrepancies.
In order for HDFS to start successfully, all resources must be available in the cluster, including ports, CPU shares, RAM and disk.
We recommend a minimum of five nodes, each with at least 2 CPU shares and 8GB of RAM available for use by the HDFS Service.

	Documentation: https://github.com/mesosphere/hdfs
	Issues: https://github.com/mesosphere/hdfs/issues
